ud3.3:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud3.3:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena yasojappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni sāvatthiṃ anuppattāni honti bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
ud3.3:3.4: Tedha kho āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā ahesuṃ.
ud3.3:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud3.3:4.2: “ke panete, ānanda, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
ud3.3:4.3: “Etāni, bhante, yasojappamukhāni pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni sāvatthiṃ anuppattāni bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
ud3.3:4.4: Tete āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
ud3.3:5.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.3:5.4: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
ud3.3:5.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinne kho te bhikkhū bhagavā etadavoca:
ud3.3:6.1: “Kiṃ nu tumhe, bhikkhave, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā, kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
ud3.3:6.2: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā yasojo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.3:6.3: “imāni, bhante, pañcamattāni bhikkhusatāni sāvatthiṃ anuppattāni bhagavantaṃ dassanāya.
ud3.3:6.4: Teme āgantukā bhikkhū nevāsikehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodamānā senāsanāni paññāpayamānā pattacīvarāni paṭisāmayamānā uccāsaddā mahāsaddā”ti.
ud3.3:7.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissutvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vajjī tena cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu.
ud3.3:7.2: Vajjīsu anupubbena cārikaṃ caramānā yena vaggumudā nadī tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
ud3.3:7.3: upasaṅkamitvā vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre paṇṇakuṭiyo karitvā vassaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
ud3.3:8.1: Atha kho āyasmā yasojo vassūpagato bhikkhū āmantesi:
ud3.3:8.2: “bhagavatā mayaṃ, āvuso, paṇāmitā atthakāmena hitesinā, anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya.
ud3.3:8.3: Handa mayaṃ, āvuso, tathā vihāraṃ kappema yathā no viharataṃ bhagavā attamano assā”ti.
ud3.3:8.4: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato yasojassa paccassosuṃ.
ud3.3:8.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharantā tenevantaravassena sabbeva tisso vijjā sacchākaṃsu.
ud3.3:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena vesālī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
ud3.3:9.2: Anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena vesālī tadavasari.
ud3.3:9.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā vesāliyaṃ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ.
ud3.3:10.1: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetasā ceto paricca manasi karitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud3.3:10.2: “ālokajātā viya me, ānanda, esā disā, obhāsajātā viya me, ānanda, esā disā;
ud3.3:10.5: Pahiṇeyyāsi tvaṃ, ānanda, vaggumudātīriyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike dūtaṃ:
ud3.3:11.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paṭissutvā yena aññataro bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami;
ud3.3:11.3: “ehi tvaṃ, āvuso, yena vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkama;
ud3.3:12.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho so bhikkhu āyasmato ānandassa paṭissutvā—
ud3.3:12.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
ud3.3:12.4: mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ antarahito vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ purato pāturahosi.
ud3.3:12.5: Atha kho so bhikkhu vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca:
ud3.3:13.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū tassa bhikkhuno paṭissutvā senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya—
ud3.3:13.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
ud3.3:13.4: vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre antarahitā mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ bhagavato sammukhe pāturahesuṃ.
ud3.3:13.5: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā āneñjena samādhinā nisinno hoti.
ud3.3:13.7: “katamena nu kho bhagavā vihārena etarahi viharatī”ti?
ud3.3:14.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante paṭhame yāme, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.3:15.1: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante majjhime yāme, uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.3:16.1: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā ānando abhikkantāya rattiyā, nikkhante pacchime yāme, uddhaste aruṇe, nandimukhiyā rattiyā uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud3.3:17.1: Atha kho bhagavā tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhahitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
ud3.3:17.2: “sace kho tvaṃ, ānanda, jāneyyāsi ettakampi te nappaṭibhāseyya.
ud3.3:17.3: Ahañca, ānanda, imāni ca pañca bhikkhusatāni sabbeva āneñjasamādhinā nisīdimhā”ti.
ud3.3:18.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
